actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to promote savings for qualified higher education expenses.
short_title: Higher Education Savings Plan Act of 1990

summary.text: Higher Education Savings Plan Act of 1990 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt distributions from a higher education expenses annuity contract from the ten-percent penalty on premature distributions from annuity contracts. Excludes the premium to purchase such a contract from gift tax liability.

titles.title: Higher Education Savings Plan Act of 1990
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to promote savings for qualified higher education expenses.
